title: Mulberry Song - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Historical   Josei   Romance   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Ancient China   Aristocracy   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Heroes   Oneshot   Politics   Priests   Selfless Protagonist   Short Story   Strong Love Interests
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
One leap from the city tower thus fulfills the Marquis of Chang Ye’s triumph in conquering the world, establishing a new era. Yet she only turns into a lonely wisp, accompanying him day and night.

Note: the title shares the same name as the female lead – Sang Ge 桑歌 meaning mulberry song>
